verses.kjv: And the LORD said unto Aaron, Thou and thy sons and thy father’s house with thee shall bear the iniquity of the sanctuary: and thou and thy sons with thee shall bear the iniquity of your priesthood.
verses.web: LORD said to Aaron, “You and your sons and your fathers’ house with you shall bear the iniquity of the sanctuary; and you and your sons with you shall bear the iniquity of your priesthood.
verses.ct: The LORD said to Aaron, "You, your sons, and your father's household will be held responsible for any offense against the sanctuary. You and your sons specifically will be held responsible for any offense related to your priesthood.

verses.kjv: And thy brethren also of the tribe of Levi, the tribe of thy father, bring thou with thee, that they may be joined unto thee, and minister unto thee: but thou and thy sons with thee shall minister before the tabernacle of witness.
verses.web: Bring your brothers also, the tribe of Levi, the tribe of your father, near with you, that they may be joined to you, and minister to you; but you and your sons with you shall be before the Tent of the Testimony.
verses.ct: Bring your relatives from the tribe of Levi — your ancestral tribe — to join you and assist you. But only you and your sons may serve directly before the tabernacle of the testimony.

verses.kjv: And they shall keep thy charge, and the charge of all the tabernacle: only they shall not come nigh the vessels of the sanctuary and the altar, that neither they, nor ye also, die.
verses.web: They shall keep your commands and the duty of the whole Tent; only they shall not come near to the vessels of the sanctuary and to the altar, that they not die, neither they nor you.
verses.ct: The Levites will carry out your instructions and handle the duties of the entire tabernacle. However, they must never touch the sacred vessels or the altar — if they do, both they and you will die.

verses.kjv: And they shall be joined unto thee, and keep the charge of the tabernacle of the congregation, for all the service of the tabernacle: and a stranger shall not come nigh unto you.
verses.web: They shall be joined to you and keep the responsibility of the Tent of Meeting, for all the service of the Tent. A stranger shall not come near to you.
verses.ct: They will work alongside you and take care of the Tent of Meeting, handling all the work of the tabernacle. No unauthorized person may come near where you serve.

verses.kjv: And ye shall keep the charge of the sanctuary, and the charge of the altar: that there be no wrath any more upon the children of Israel.
verses.web: “You shall perform the duty of the sanctuary and the duty of the altar, that there be no more wrath on the children of Israel.
verses.ct: You are responsible for the duties of the sanctuary and the altar, so that God's wrath never falls on the people of Israel again.

verses.kjv: And I, behold, I have taken your brethren the Levites from among the children of Israel: to you they are given as a gift for the LORD, to do the service of the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.web: Behold, I myself have taken your brothers the Levites from among the children of Israel. They are a gift to you, dedicated to LORD, to do the service of the Tent of Meeting.
verses.ct: I myself have chosen your fellow Levites from among the Israelites and given them to you as a gift, dedicated to the LORD, to carry out the work of the Tent of Meeting.

verses.kjv: Therefore thou and thy sons with thee shall keep your priest’s office for everything of the altar, and within the vail; and ye shall serve: I have given your priest’s office unto you as a service of gift: and the stranger that cometh nigh shall be put to death.
verses.web: You and your sons with you shall keep your priesthood for everything of the altar, and for that within the veil. You shall serve. I give you the service of the priesthood as a gift. The stranger who comes near shall be put to death.”
verses.ct: But you and your sons alone must carry out the priestly duties — everything related to the altar and everything behind the curtain. I'm giving you the priesthood as a gift of service. Anyone else who approaches these sacred duties will be put to death."

verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Aaron, Behold, I also have given thee the charge of mine heave offerings of all the hallowed things of the children of Israel; unto thee have I given them by reason of the anointing, and to thy sons, by an ordinance for ever.
verses.web: LORD spoke to Aaron, “Behold, I myself have given you the command of my wave offerings, even all the holy things of the children of Israel. I have given them to you by reason of the anointing, and to your sons, as a portion forever.
verses.ct: The LORD also said to Aaron, "I am putting you in charge of all the sacred contributions that the Israelites bring to me. I have given them to you and your sons as your permanent share, because of your anointing as priests.

verses.kjv: This shall be thine of the most holy things, reserved from the fire: every oblation of theirs, every meat offering of theirs, and every sin offering of theirs, and every trespass offering of theirs which they shall render unto me, shall be most holy for thee and for thy sons.
verses.web: This shall be yours of the most holy things from the fire: every offering of theirs, even every meal offering of theirs, and every sin offering of theirs, and every trespass offering of theirs, which they shall render to me, shall be most holy for you and for your sons.
verses.ct: Here is what belongs to you from the most holy offerings kept from the fire: every grain offering, every sin offering, and every guilt offering that the people present to me. These are most holy, and they belong to you and your sons.

verses.kjv: In the most holy place shalt thou eat it; every male shall eat it: it shall be holy unto thee.
verses.web: You shall eat of it like the most holy things. Every male shall eat of it. It shall be holy to you.
verses.ct: You must eat these offerings in a most holy place. Every male among you may eat them. They are to be treated as holy.

verses.kjv: And this is thine; the heave offering of their gift, with all the wave offerings of the children of Israel: I have given them unto thee, and to thy sons and to thy daughters with thee, by a statute for ever: every one that is clean in thy house shall eat of it.
verses.web: “This is yours, too: the wave offering of their gift, even all the wave offerings of the children of Israel. I have given them to you, and to your sons and to your daughters with you, as a portion forever. Everyone who is clean in your house shall eat of it.
verses.ct: This is also yours: the wave offerings that the Israelites present as gifts. I have given these to you, your sons, and your daughters as a permanent share. Anyone in your household who is ceremonially clean may eat them.

verses.kjv: All the best of the oil, and all the best of the wine, and of the wheat, the firstfruits of them which they shall offer unto the LORD, them have I given thee.
verses.web: “I have given to you all the best of the oil, all the best of the vintage, and of the grain, the first fruits of them which they give to LORD.
verses.ct: I have given you the finest olive oil, the finest new wine, and the finest grain — the first fruits that the people offer to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And whatsoever is first ripe in the land, which they shall bring unto the LORD, shall be thine; every one that is clean in thine house shall eat of it.
verses.web: The first-ripe fruits of all that is in their land, which they bring to LORD, shall be yours. Everyone who is clean in your house shall eat of it.
verses.ct: The first ripe produce of their land that they bring to the LORD will be yours. Anyone in your household who is ceremonially clean may eat it.

verses.kjv: Every thing devoted in Israel shall be thine.
verses.web: “Everything devoted in Israel shall be yours.
verses.ct: Everything in Israel that is devoted to the LORD belongs to you.

verses.kjv: Every thing that openeth the matrix in all flesh, which they bring unto the LORD, whether it be of men or beasts, shall be thine: nevertheless the firstborn of man shalt thou surely redeem, and the firstling of unclean beasts shalt thou redeem.
verses.web: Everything that opens the womb, of all flesh which they offer to LORD, both of man and animal, shall be yours. Nevertheless, you shall surely redeem the firstborn of man, and you shall redeem the firstborn of unclean animals.
verses.ct: Every firstborn — whether human or animal — that is offered to the LORD will be yours. However, you must always accept a payment to redeem every firstborn son, and you must also redeem the firstborn of every unclean animal.

verses.kjv: And those that are to be redeemed from a month old shalt thou redeem, according to thine estimation, for the money of five shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary, which is twenty gerahs.
verses.web: You shall redeem those who are to be redeemed of them from a month old, according to your estimation, for five shekels of money, according to the shekel of the sanctuary, which weighs twenty gerahs.
verses.ct: The redemption price for a firstborn son, payable when the child is 1 month old, is 5 shekels of silver, measured by the sanctuary standard of 20 gerahs per shekel.

verses.kjv: But the firstling of a cow, or the firstling of a sheep, or the firstling of a goat, thou shalt not redeem; they are holy: thou shalt sprinkle their blood upon the altar, and shalt burn their fat for an offering made by fire, for a sweet savour unto the LORD.
verses.web: “But you shall not redeem the firstborn of a cow, or the firstborn of a sheep, or the firstborn of a goat. They are holy. You shall sprinkle their blood on the altar, and shall burn their fat for an offering made by fire, for a pleasant aroma to LORD.
verses.ct: But you must not redeem the firstborn of a cow, a sheep, or a goat — they are holy. You must sprinkle their blood on the altar and burn their fat as a fire offering, a pleasing aroma to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And the flesh of them shall be thine, as the wave breast and as the right shoulder are thine.
verses.web: Their meat shall be yours, as the wave offering breast and as the right thigh, it shall be yours.
verses.ct: The meat from these animals belongs to you, just as the breast of the wave offering and the right thigh belong to you.

verses.kjv: All the heave offerings of the holy things, which the children of Israel offer unto the LORD, have I given thee, and thy sons and thy daughters with thee, by a statute for ever: it is a covenant of salt for ever before the LORD unto thee and to thy seed with thee.
verses.web: All the wave offerings of the holy things which the children of Israel offer to LORD, I have given you and your sons and your daughters with you, as a portion forever. It is a covenant of salt forever before LORD to you and to your offspring with you.”
verses.ct: All the sacred contributions that the Israelites offer to the LORD, I have given to you, your sons, and your daughters as a permanent share. This is an everlasting covenant of salt before the LORD for you and your descendants."

verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Aaron, Thou shalt have no inheritance in their land, neither shalt thou have any part among them: I am thy part and thine inheritance among the children of Israel.
verses.web: LORD said to Aaron, “You shall have no inheritance in their land, neither shall you have any portion among them. I am your portion and your inheritance among the children of Israel.
verses.ct: The LORD said to Aaron, "You will not receive any land as an inheritance among the Israelites, and you will own no portion of their territory. I am your portion and your inheritance among the people of Israel.

verses.kjv: And, behold, I have given the children of Levi all the tenth in Israel for an inheritance, for their service which they serve, even the service of the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.web: “To the children of Levi, behold, I have given all the tithe in Israel for an inheritance, in return for their service which they serve, even the service of the Tent of Meeting.
verses.ct: As for the Levites, I have given them every tithe collected in Israel as their inheritance, in exchange for the work they do serving at the Tent of Meeting.

verses.kjv: Neither must the children of Israel henceforth come nigh the tabernacle of the congregation, lest they bear sin, and die.
verses.web: Henceforth the children of Israel shall not come near the Tent of Meeting, lest they bear sin, and die.
verses.ct: From now on, ordinary Israelites must not approach the Tent of Meeting, or they will be guilty of sin and will die.

verses.kjv: But the Levites shall do the service of the tabernacle of the congregation, and they shall bear their iniquity: it shall be a statute for ever throughout your generations, that among the children of Israel they have no inheritance.
verses.web: But the Levites shall do the service of the Tent of Meeting, and they shall bear their iniquity. It shall be a statute forever throughout your generations. Among the children of Israel, they shall have no inheritance.
verses.ct: Only the Levites are to perform the service of the Tent of Meeting, and they will bear the responsibility for any failures. This is a permanent law for every generation: the Levites will receive no land inheritance among the Israelites.

verses.kjv: But the tithes of the children of Israel, which they offer as an heave offering unto the LORD, I have given to the Levites to inherit: therefore I have said unto them, Among the children of Israel they shall have no inheritance.
verses.web: For the tithe of the children of Israel, which they offer as a wave offering to LORD, I have given to the Levites for an inheritance. Therefore I have said to them, ‘Among the children of Israel they shall have no inheritance.’ ”
verses.ct: Instead, I have given the Levites the tithes that the Israelites present as an offering to the LORD. That is their inheritance. That's why I told them they would receive no land among the Israelites."

verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD said to Moses,

verses.kjv: Thus speak unto the Levites, and say unto them, When ye take of the children of Israel the tithes which I have given you from them for your inheritance, then ye shall offer up an heave offering of it for the LORD, even a tenth part of the tithe.
verses.web: “Moreover you shall speak to the Levites, and tell them, ‘When you take of the children of Israel the tithe which I have given you from them for your inheritance, then you shall offer up a wave offering of it for LORD, a tithe of the tithe.
verses.ct: "Give these instructions to the Levites: 'When you receive the tithe from the Israelites — the inheritance I have given you from them — you must set aside a tenth of that tithe as an offering to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And this your heave offering shall be reckoned unto you, as though it were the corn of the threshingfloor, and as the fulness of the winepress.
verses.web: Your wave offering shall be credited to you, as though it were the grain of the threshing floor, and as the fullness of the wine press.
verses.ct: This offering of yours will be credited to you just as if it were grain from your own threshing floor or juice from your own winepress.

verses.kjv: Thus ye also shall offer an heave offering unto the LORD of all your tithes, which ye receive of the children of Israel; and ye shall give thereof the LORD’s heave offering to Aaron the priest.
verses.web: Thus you also shall offer a wave offering to LORD of all your tithes, which you receive of the children of Israel; and of it you shall give LORD’s wave offering to Aaron the priest.
verses.ct: In this way, you too will present an offering to the LORD from all the tithes you receive from the Israelites. You must give the LORD's portion of that offering to Aaron the priest.

verses.kjv: Out of all your gifts ye shall offer every heave offering of the LORD, of all the best thereof, even the hallowed part thereof out of it.
verses.web: Out of all your gifts, you shall offer every wave offering to LORD, of all its best parts, even the holy part of it.’
verses.ct: From every gift you receive, you must set aside the best and holiest part as the LORD's offering.'

verses.kjv: Therefore thou shalt say unto them, When ye have heaved the best thereof from it, then it shall be counted unto the Levites as the increase of the threshingfloor, and as the increase of the winepress.
verses.web: “Therefore you shall tell them, ‘When you heave its best from it, then it shall be credited to the Levites as the increase of the threshing floor, and as the increase of the wine press.
verses.ct: "Tell them also: 'Once you have set aside the best portion, the rest will be credited to you as if it were produce from your own threshing floor or winepress.

verses.kjv: And ye shall eat it in every place, ye and your households: for it is your reward for your service in the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.web: You may eat it anywhere, you and your households, for it is your reward in return for your service in the Tent of Meeting.
verses.ct: You and your households may eat the remainder anywhere you wish. It is your wages for the work you do at the Tent of Meeting.

verses.kjv: And ye shall bear no sin by reason of it, when ye have heaved from it the best of it: neither shall ye pollute the holy things of the children of Israel, lest ye die.
verses.web: You shall bear no sin by reason of it, when you have heaved from it its best. You shall not profane the holy things of the children of Israel, that you not die.’ ”
verses.ct: As long as you set aside the best part first, you will not be guilty of sin. But if you fail to do this, you will be defiling the holy offerings of the Israelites — and you will die.'"
